Key Match Events: Julian Alvarez scored the first goal for Argentina in the 49th minute
Lautaro Martinez scored the second goal for Argentina in the 88th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Defending champions Argentina began their Copa América defense with a win
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Messi expressed satisfaction with the 'important' win over Canada
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina dominated possession with 64.4% of the ball
Lionel Messi had a left-footed shot saved in the top right corner in the 90'+6' minute
Others: The match was played at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, Georgia, USA with an attendance of 70,564
The referee for the match was Jesús Valenzuela
